our end-to-end encrypted video calls
require the use of a signaling and

these components are run on top of ec2

in addition we use elastic load

docker simplifies the workflow from

what this means is that our engineers
can

in addition
in the process of onboarding and

docker also simplifies and reduces

we can use the power of docker to

in addition since docker containers are

finally

we're using docker with aws to go

production
which you launch your new services onto

in the past when as we explored building

actually build this out
